name: "Love Thy Trophy" Trivia Game | 'Family Guy'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was Cleveland's suggested theme for the parade?
questions.explanation:
Togetherness.

	Cleveland thought it would be a simple theme, yet powerful nonetheless.  The theme turned out to be Peter's choice: The episode of "Who's the Boss" where Tony sees Angela naked in the shower.

questions.text: What street do the Griffins live on?
questions.explanation:
Spooner Street.

	The street begins working together to build a float that captures the spirit of the Harvest Festival parade.  The people working on the float include Joe's family, Cleveland's family, Quagmire, and the Griffins.

questions.text: To buy a Prada Bag, Meg gets a job as a what?
questions.explanation:
A waitress.

	Meg is hired as a waitress at a pancake house called Flappy Joe's, but only because of Stewie.

questions.text: This episode shows Quahog's eighty-third annual Harvest Festival Parade.
questions.explanation:
True.

	This year, everyone has different floats regarding the episode of "Who's the Boss" where Tony sees Angela naked in the shower.  Not all of the floats depict the scene though.

questions.text: What is the name of the trophy given for the best float in the Harvest Festival Parade?
questions.explanation:
Golden Clam & The Golden Clam.

	Once Spooner Street wins the Golden Clam, the neighbours don't know who the trophy should go to, so they start fighting.

questions.text: Which object do Peter and Lois not have in their shopping cart at the hardware store?
questions.explanation:
Land Mines.

	Peter and Lois ask a store employee if they sell land mines before their neighbours begin to show up and buy security aids.

questions.text: Who does Cleveland catch in a lobster trap?
questions.explanation:
Chris.

	Chris is found trapped in a lobster trap eating a Fenway Frank.  This happens when the street begins building forts to oppose each other in a community war.

Sixteen.

	Peter has no idea Meg is a teenager until she says she is.  This is when she reveals how she earned so much money in one week, and why Stewie is in a foster home.

Brian.

	Brian soon had an obsession with the trophy and buried it in the yard when everyone was asleep.  He manages to stay under the radar through the whole ordeal.

questions.text: Does Chris speak in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Chris had maybe one or two lines during the whole episode, and everyone else in the whole community has more lines than him.
